title:
Discontinuity of Lyapunov exponents for SL$(2,\mathbb{R})$ valued
  cocycles
abstract:
We exhibit an example of a discontinuity point for the Lyapunov exponents as
a function of the cocycle in the H\"older topology. The linear cocycle taking
values in SL$(2,\mathbb{R})$ is locally constant and defined over a Bernoulli
shift. Our example extends Bocker-Viana's and Butler's results.
